SELECT a.id ,a.checktype ,a.orderid ,b.pure_phone_number as phonenumber ,a.updtime ,CONCAT(a.firstname, '|', a.lastname) as fullname ,ifnull(a.titile, ' ') as title ,a.filename ,ifnull(a.originalurl, ' ') as originalurl ,ifnull(a.pdfreporturl, ' ') as pdfreporturl ,ifnull(a.htmlreporturl, ' ') as htmlreporturl ,CASE a.status WHEN '0' THEN '初始' WHEN '1' THEN '待支付' WHEN '2' THEN '检测中' WHEN '3' THEN '报告下载中' WHEN '4' THEN '检测完成' WHEN '9' THEN '已退款' ELSE '其它' END as status FROM g_order a LEFT JOIN g_wx_user b ON b.openid = a.openid WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY a.updtime DESC
LIMIT #{startindex}, #{pagesize};
